column4: Can I newbie like me establish a SSH connection for data transfer between xubuntu and opensuse? I need to connect two laptops on the same network
sure, why not? ssh (ip)
what does it take?
ssh is the package name
Ok, I will install it along with openssh-server. Is that right?
are there anymore packages I need to have to start process?
ssh only I think
sorry for bothering, I appreaciate your help. I would be glad if you could tell me what's next after install?
'ssh (ip of host)'
in terminal? is 'host' another computer I want to connect?
yes to both questions :)
did that, but nothing really happened...
what exactly happened?
another line appeared
a blank line or the prompt?
the line where I can enter another command
hmm...
I am on xubuntu, not ubuntu, btw
what about 'ssh (username)@(ip of host)'?
the same...
sorry, I don't know... do you have the ssh server/host on the host?
I guess so, btw, Ive managed to connect this machine (xubuntu 9.10) from opensuse, Ive typed sftp://(ip of this machine/ in nautilus.
I don't really know why, sorry.
thanks for you help
